post.text: This is a struggle for the survival of OUR nation, and this will be our last chance to save it. We MUST raise our voices on November 8th!

comment.author: Colin
comment.text: Many of us do not share Donald Trump's past values, but we do love our country. In my opinion, it is not about him. It is about: 1. Who will preserve and a protect the constitution? 2. Who will protect the second amendment? 3. Who will not send your son or daughter into harms way unless there is a good reason. 4. Who does not support partial-birth abortion? 5. Who wants to fix our inner cities and our infrastructure? 6. Who will improve our economy and bring jobs back to the USA? 7. Who is a nationalist and not a globalist? 8. Who will protect our vets from dying in the streets and on park benches and get them help when they need it? 9. Who supports our police, firemen, military men and women? 10. Who will protect our borders from criminal elements and terrorist? 11. Who will not leave Americans to die in foreign countries under the hands of terrorist? 12. Who is now a professed Christian and changed man according to many Christian leaders and pastors? These are just a few reasons I am voting for Donald Trump. PLEASE SHARE

replies.author: Kelly
replies.text: Anyone who disagrees with Trump will be fired.....haven't u seen what he's been doing!!! He will rule any way he wants as authoritarian!!!

replies.author: Melissa
replies.text: Let's hope no one treats your daughter/sister/wife like trump has treated women before.

replies.author: Ethan
replies.text: Its about him being UNFIT ON ALL LEVELS !!

replies.author: Emma
replies.text: I would also add that when the elderly have gone thru all of their assets and have to get Medicaid for nursing home assistance they and their families are treated like criminals ! They examine every nickel they have spent for the last 6 years and god forbid they gave a gift of $100 for a graduation it is held against them!!! Yet the welfare queens who don't know who daddy is and refugees get everything handed to them . This is a platform that should be addressed.
